In the next few days, temperatures will initially remain late autumn. From midweek, however, it will be cold. The reason for this
is an easterly wind, which will blow over RUS to Scandinavia.
By the weekend, it should be barely 5 C. The DWD expects regionally permafrost. https://t.co/N4B92hwXEB

In den nächsten Tagen bleiben die Temperaturen zunächst
spätherbstlich. Ab Wochenmitte wird es jedoch kalt. Der Grund dafür
ist ein Ostwind, der sich über
RUS bis nach Skandinavien
ausweitet.Zum Wochenende dürften es dann kaum noch 5 C werden.Der DWD erwartet regional Dauerfrost. https://t.co/4D9GexDHam

Germany earned a 1-1 draw (0-0) against Spain in their second World Cup group match in Qatar. After Alvaro Morata gave Spain a 1-0 lead in the 62nd minute, Niclas Füllkrug equalized for Germany in the 83rd minute.
Niclas Füllkrug equalized for Germany in the 83rd minute. https://t.co/IQj093v5k0

Deutschland hat sich im zweiten WM-Gruppenspiel in Katar ein 1:1-Unterschieden (0:0) gegen Spanien erkämpft. Nachdem Alvaro Morata Spanien in der 62. Spielminute die 1:0-Führung brachte, gelang Niclas Füllkrug in
der 83. Minute der Ausgleich für Deutschland. https://t.co/MDqlHhKHoc

Intense fighting has occurred around the towns of Pavlivka and Vuhledar in the south of the Donetsk region. According to the GB Secret Service
the RUS Marines have suffered heavy losses. Meanwhile, Kiev reports that the supply of electricity, water and heat has been restored. https://t.co/j78YbzKw6x

After the serious freight train accident between Hanover and Berlin,DB has reported initial progress in the cleanup operations. According to the report, the first wagon has been removed. However, passengers must
still have to reckon with delays and train cancellations. https://t.co/KnFfrtbOP6

Nach dem schweren Güterzugunfall

weiterhin mit Verspätungen und Zugausfällen rechnen. https://t.co/w3NX7GLvwz
